  • Method Details

    • addTeam

      public static String addTeam(String name, String nationality)
      Adds team based on params from the form
      Parameters:
      name - name of the team
      nationality - nationality of the team
      Returns:
      validation string (to print)

    • editMatch

      public static boolean editMatch(FootballClub team1, FootballClub team2, String time, String date, String fieldNr, String score1, String score2)
      Edits an existing match
      Parameters:
      team1 - The first football team playing the match
      team2 - The second football team playing the match
      time - The updated time of the match, can be left blank
      date - The updated date of the match, can be left blank
      fieldNr - The updated field number where the match takes place, can be left blank
      score1 - The updated score of team 1, can be left blank
      score2 - The updated score of team 2, can be left blank
      Returns:
      true if the match got edited successfully, false otherwise

    • allMatchesHaveWinner

      public static boolean allMatchesHaveWinner(ArrayList<Match> matches)
      Check if all matches have winner
      Parameters:
      matches - Match arraylist to check
      Returns:
      true or false
